Description.EN: This shortcut displays the settings window.
Description.ZH: 这个快捷键可以打开设置界面。

Description.EN: This shortcut instantly builds existing blueprints nearby (within a 20 meters radius by default).
Description.ZH: 这个快捷键可以立即完成周围半径20米范围内所有蓝图的建造。

Description.EN: BuildingTweaks is a mod for Green Hell that allows the player to instantly build blueprints, instantly finish blueprints that are already placed, and place blueprints everywhere. Author: OSubMarin
Description.ZH: “建筑大师”是专为《绿色地狱》开发的模组，通过它玩家的蓝图可以立马完成而无需任何材料，并且能够在游戏的任意位置放置蓝图。该模组由OSubMarin制作。
